import React from 'react' import Product from '../products'; import Rating from '../components/Rating'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Col, Row, Image, ListGroup, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap'; const ProductDetails = ({match}) => { const product = Product.find((p)=> p._id === match.params.id); return (
  GO BACK

{product.name}

 Price : ${product.price} {product.description} Status : {product.countInStock>0}
) } export default ProductDetails
